channel.title: CVE Feed for Theme4Press -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Theme4Press -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37206|2024-08-02T03:50:55.145Z -- theme4press -- demo%20awesome
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Theme4Press Demo Awesome allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Demo Awesome: from n/a through 1.0.1.
